exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Warm up with an easy, dynamic stretch. Make sure to go chin to bar and all the way down on every rep.

exercises.name: Unilateral Iliac Pull-downs
exercises.description: Set the cable on the highest notch. Sit on an inclined bench facing the cable machine, put your hand on the bench for support. Stop pulling when your elbow is by your side.

exercises.name: Unilateral Lumbar Rows
exercises.description: Set the cable somewhere in the middle, somewhere around 5-6. Sit on an inclined bench facing the cable machine, put your hand on the bench for support. Stop pulling when your elbow is by your side.

exercises.name: Incline Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Make sure to not let your elbows swing. Control the movement and keep your elbows in place.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Make sure to not let your elbows swing. Control the movement and keep your elbows in place.

exercises.name: Forearm Curls
exercises.description: Make sure you are getting a full range of motion. Pick a weight that you can comfortably control.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Warm up with an easy, dynamic stretch. Make sure to go chin to bar and all the way down on every rep.

exercises.name: Incline DB Rear Delt Rows â†’ Incline DB Shrugs
exercises.description: Put the bench on a 45 degree angle and lay down on it with your head over the top of the bench. Complete your set of rear delt rows, and follow them up with shrugs which will be done until failure.

exercises.name: Unilateral Thoracic Rows
exercises.description: Set the cable on one of the lower notches, somewhere around 1-2. Put one knee on an inclined bench facing the cable machine, put your hand on the bench for support. Stop pulling when your elbow is by your side.

exercises.name: Cable Rear Delt Flies
exercises.description: Set the cable on one of the higher notches. Stand centered to the cable machine, and put the non-working hand on the machine for support. Pull down all the way to your side, with the cable lined up with your arm. Make sure to not use your triceps to help you pull.

exercises.name: Unilateral Preacher Curls
exercises.description: Set up a bench at a 60 degree angle and rest your arm on the inclined part of the bench. Make sure that your wrists are up to prevent injury.

exercises.name: Reverse Curls
exercises.description: Make sure to not let your elbows swing. Control the movement and keep your elbows in place.

exercises.name: Forearm Curls
exercises.description: Kneel down and rest both arms on the bench. Curl with your arms still resting on the bench, using a pronated grip. Make sure you are getting a full range of motion. Pick a weight that you can comfortably control.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Warm up with an easy, dynamic stretch. Make sure to go chin to bar and all the way down on every rep.
